Walter Rogers

  1. Foster Name: Walter
  2. Foster Family: Seifert
  3. Location of Family: Tilden, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Neligh, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 5
  7. Date of Birth: , Bloomingburg, NY
  8. Gender: male
  9. Source: Crossroads April 1991, p. 13; "Riders of the Orphan Trains: Nebraska," http://www.usgennet.org/usa/ne/topic/trains/riders.htm; Mary Ellen Johnson, comp., Orphan Train Riders: Their Own Stories vol. 1 (Baltimore: Gateway Press, 1992), p.155-156; National Orphan Train Complex; Letter to Antelope County Historical Society by C. Lloyd Castner.
